segments.text: hi , I'm Lucas , I just moved in next door .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , hi Lucas , come on in . I'm Barbara . Nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: would you like something to drink ? I've got tea and some grape juice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thanks . Some tea would be nice . Chinese tea is great . I really like your tea set . Where did you get it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , there is a supermarket not far from here . But there is also a tea house around the corner , where you can get tea and a tea set as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh yeah , I saw the tea house the other day . I think I might go and have a look sometime . It's a nice neighborhood here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you are right about that . It's quiet and very convenient . You can get to the bus and the subway stations within ten minutes'walk . There's a grocery store , a book store , a gym , and many restaurants
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: there's a gym nearby ? That's exciting ! I really want to start to go to gym as soon as possible . I've been lazy this summer holiday and have put on some weight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , if you want we can go together sometime . Actually I was thinking of going this afternoon , if you like , you can join me and I can show you the neighborhood along the way .
segments.speaker: S2
